did.unittitle: Collection of Copperplate Engravings of Scenes of Work Activities from Diderots Encyclopedia
did.abstract: These are eighteenth century book plates from "Diderot's Encyclopedia".

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Hand-colored plates from "Diderot's Encyclopedia". The following plates are included in this group: Monnoyage. Plate 15 ; Ceinturier. Plate 1 ; Coutelier. Plate 1 ; Coutelier. Plate 2 ; Coutelier. Plate 3 ; Taillanderie, Fabrique des Etaux. Plate 1 ; Forges. 3e Section, Fourneau en marchandise ; plate 5 ; Foreges. 3e Section, Fourneau Coulage a la Poche ; Fonderie en Caracteres ; Verriere en bois. Plate 7 ; Verriere en bois. Plate 19 ; Verriere Francoise en Bouteilles. plate 1 ; Monnoyage, Machine pour la Marque sur Tranche. Plate 16 ; Papetterie, Colage. Plate 11 ; Potier de Terre. Plate 3.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Collection of Copperplate Engravings of Scenes of Work Activities from Diderots Encyclopedia #5908 P. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: From Tome 26. Original publication Paris: Le Breton, 1771.
PLANCHE I. The vignette represents the interior of a toolmaker's shop and various operations.

did.unittitle: Verrerie en bois, Différentes Opérations relatives à la façon d'un Verre (Planche 19)

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: From Tome 27. Original publication Paris: Le Breton, 1772.
PLANCHE XIX: Making a stemmed glass.

did.unittitle: Forges, Troisieme Section, Fourneau en Marchandise, Coulage à la Poche (Planche IX)

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: From Tome 21. Original publication Paris: Le Breton, 1765.
PLATE IX. Ladle casting. The vignette represents the interior of the hall in front of the furnace; the roof and the framework that supports it have been broken open to reveal the interior.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: From Tome 19. Original publication Paris: Le Breton, 1763.
PLATE On the engraving of punches. The vignette represents the interior of a workshop in which there is a forge.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: From Tome 22. Original publication Paris: Le Breton, 1767.
PLATE XI. The vignette represents the gluers' workshop.

did.unittitle: Monnoyage, Machine pour la Marque sur tranche - Pl. XVI
Forges, 3 Sedion, Fourneau en Marchandise, Moulage en Sable - Pl. V
Verrerie Francoise en Bouteilles : Verrerie en Charbon de Terre, Four a Bouteilles, et l'Operation de Cueillir le Verre dans le Pot - Pl. I
Verrerie en bois, l'Operation de briser les vieux pots, de les piler et tamiser pour les meler avec la terre glaise et Outils - Pl. VII
